core_principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix 'Air Traffic Control' with 'Cyberpunk Logistics'
Emotion First: Safety = Clarity. Speed = Precision.
Content is King: Data must be scannable instantly.
Zoom In: Focus on the vehicle status and location.
Negative Space: Use it to separate dense data clusters.
anti_patterns: No purple/teal for CTAs (Use Electric Blue or Signal Red)

usage_rules: Headings must be Chivo. If Chivo is unavailable, use a strong Grotesque.
Data values (speed, time, ID) must use JetBrains Mono.
Labels must be uppercase and tracking-wide.

structure.sidebar: w-64 fixed h-full border-r border-border bg-card/50 backdrop-blur-xl z-50
structure.header: sticky top-0 z-40 w-full border-b border-border bg-background/80 backdrop-blur-md

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 h-10 px-4 py-2 rounded-md font-medium transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80 h-10 px-4 py-2 rounded-md font-medium transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.destructive: bg-destructive text-destructive-foreground hover:bg-destructive/90 h-10 px-4 py-2 rounded-md font-medium transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.ghost: hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground h-10 px-4 py-2 rounded-md font-medium transition-all active:scale-95

inputs.style: bg-background border-input focus:ring-2 focus:ring-ring focus:border-transparent h-10 rounded-md

status_badges.active: bg-green-500/15 text-green-500 border border-green-500/20 px-2 py-0.5 rounded-full text-xs font-medium uppercase tracking-wide
status_badges.inactive: bg-zinc-500/15 text-zinc-400 border border-zinc-500/20 px-2 py-0.5 rounded-full text-xs font-medium uppercase tracking-wide
status_badges.alert: bg-red-500/15 text-red-500 border border-red-500/20 px-2 py-0.5 rounded-full text-xs font-medium uppercase tracking-wide
status_badges.warning: bg-yellow-500/15 text-yellow-500 border border-yellow-500/20 px-2 py-0.5 rounded-full text-xs font-medium uppercase tracking-wide

visual_enhancers.noise_texture: opacity-20 pointer-events-none fixed inset-0 z-50 mix-blend-overlay

transitions.page_load: initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 10 }} animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }} exit={{ opacity: 0, y: -10 }} transition={{ duration: 0.3 }}

accessibility.contrast: Ensure 4.5:1 for normal text, 3:1 for large text.
accessibility.focus_states: Visible ring-2 ring-offset-2 ring-ring on all interactive elements.

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. THEME: Ensure 'dark' class is applied to the html/body tag by default.
3. LAYOUT: Use the 'SidebarLayout' component pattern for all admin pages.
4. MAPS: Use 'react-map-gl' or a placeholder div with the map image if API key is missing. Overlay vehicle markers using absolute positioning.
5. TABLES: Use Shadcn Table component. Implement search and filter in a toolbar above the table.
6. FORMS: Use Shadcn Form/Input/Select components. Validate using Zod.
7. DASHBOARD: Use the Bento Grid layout. Create 'StatCard' components for the top row.
8. OFFENCES: Use a 'DataTable' with a 'StatusBadge' column for severity.
9. TESTING: Add 'data-testid' to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, links).
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI slop' aesthetic (generic centered layouts, uniform styling).
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
Do NOT apply universal transition (e.g., transition: all).
Do NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles (pill-shaped or sharp).
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures and noise overlays are recommended.
